commit.message:
s390.c (s390_delegitimize_address): Handle GOTOFF unspecs.

2011-03-18  Andreas Krebbel  <Andreas.Krebbel@de.ibm.com>

	* config/s390/s390.c (s390_delegitimize_address): Handle GOTOFF
	unspecs.
